attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs: "To initiate an external transfer, navigate to the \"Transfers\" section and select the \"External Transfer\" option. Proceed by entering the recipient's bank details, and then authenticate the transaction by entering your PIN or utilizing biometric authentication."

response: "To initiate an external transfer, navigate to the \"Transfers\" section and select the \"External Transfer\" option. Proceed by entering the recipient's bank details, and then authenticate the transaction by entering your PIN or utilizing biometric authentication."
